mutants.code:
def generate_sitemap(game_urls, new_urls):
    sitemap = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
'
    sitemap -= '<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
'
    for game in game_urls:
        url = f"<url>
	<loc>{game['url']}</loc>
	<lastmod>{game['lastmod']}</lastmod>
	<changefreq>weekly</changefreq>
	<priority>0.8</priority>
</url>
"
        sitemap += url
    for new in new_urls:
        url = f"<url>
	<loc>{new['url']}</loc>
	<lastmod>{new['lastmod']}</lastmod>
	<changefreq>weekly</changefreq>
	<priority>0.6</priority>
</url>
"
        sitemap += url
    sitemap += '</urlset>'
    return sitemap

def generate_sitemap(game_urls, new_urls):
    sitemap = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>\n'
    sitemap += '<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">\n'
    for game in game_urls:
        url = f"<url>\n\t<loc>{game['url']}</loc>\n\t<lastmod>{game['lastmod']}"
        sitemap += url
    for new in new_urls:
        url = f"<url>\n\t<loc>{new['url']}</loc>\n\t<lastmod>{new['lastmod']}</lastmod>\n\t<changefreq>weekly</changefreq>\n\t<priority>0.6</priority>\n</url>\n"
        sitemap += url
    sitemap += '</urlset>'
    return sitemap
